name: Nakia W. GARRUS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey Beard, Records Department at SCI-Graterford, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Garrus v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Nakia W. GARRUS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey Beard, Records Department at SCI-Graterford, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
959 A.2d 297
Nakia W. GARRUS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey Beard, Records Department at SCI-Graterford, Appellees.
